column3: “This is the Mike Tyson of strains. It just punches you right in the face and says, Stay the fuck down! You ain't goin' nowhere anymore. And wipe that stoney
column4: zoned-out look off your face! Yea
column5: I know you had a plan to eat. Everybody has a plan until they get punched in the face. Aww
column7: you should have grabbed some food before you started
column9: you're just gonna have to sit there and think ab...”"

column3: “I had 4 grams of Pure Kush this weekend and it is some of the best stuff I have ever smoked. It's so sticky, smells dank, taste so beautiful and gives you such an amazing high. It relaxes you so much but it is a controllable high where you still want to talk and interact with people. I smoked 5 joints of Pure Kush yesterday at the rebelution concert and It made me happy and made me want to dance and hang with people....”

“First off, I need to say, this is definitely one of the best strains I have come across! I'm very happy I got to try this delicious strain, as this is another wonderful Indica that I have gotten my hands on. The buds of this plant look fairly similar to OG Kush; light green with orange pistils, and a nice coat of sparkly trichomes. The aroma is subtle and nice; a light mix of citrus, spicy, and skunky smells, and upo...”

“The dispensary I picked this up from had it labeled Malibu Pure Kush but the genetics were the same. Pure Kush has pushed itself into the top 7 of my favorite indicas of all time. These beautifully crystalized buds are amazing, they pack such a heavy punch it was really surprising. I imagine if I had smoked more than 2 bowls I would have been completely knocked out. Had a nice euphoric feeling to it too. Knocked out ...”

“Started smoking soon after I started my HIV meds at the advice of my Doc in 1998.  Cannabis is not legal in IL. and you get what you can find. Having options and reading these reviews was extremely helpful for me so thank you and I hope this helps someone else.

So here is my story in a nutshell, a normal day for me used to involve daily vomiting, nausea, and the occasional SHART" surprise. I also have ADD and hav...”"

“Regular, pure everyday Kush is starting to be hard to find considering how many different strains of Kush there are now. It's a very light green with a sticky, crystal paradise that has a pine and citrus scent surrounding the flower. I love the smell and taste of this flower when inhaled. It may be hard to hold in, however, the taste is great. You definitely want to keep smoking more of it due to the ability to acqui...”

“To the dude who said it came outta Humboldt...It's a Mendo/Lake County creation.  Great strain...but the best bud no longer rolls from Humboldt...everyone's pretty clear on that...but more to the point, what an Indica...”
“🤑 = ..dis shit right here nigga.."

column1: Pleasantly overwhelms the senses with its Kushy taste and aroma
column2: this strain is not for a beginner
column3: unless physical pain is to be remedied. The high can make you...”"

“This is the perfect strain for indica users. Just perfect - gets your head into that space where problems don't exist and gravity's rules seem to break, and that's just for the head high. The body high is concentrated in the chest, from where it radiates slightly into the shoulders and neck. Mmm. It's also so wonderful at battling insomnia that it may as well be a pharmaceutical sleep aid only without the displeasure...”
“Excellent strain. Best for insomnia IMO. Smells amazing: kind of like grapefruit and mint. Would buy again.”

“Strong for sure this smooth tasting indica has hints of lemon and skunk under its earthy tones. While the initial buzz goes to the brain the after effects are a soothing body relaxation making this an excellent pain relief choice. It also stimulates appetite and is perfect before bed”

“If you want something to really put you out this is it! I can never sleep all night unless i smoke this strain then i wake wondering how i got into my bed. I would encourage anyone who needs stresss and pain relief pick this up. Smokes for a long time too.”

“Dopest dope I've ever smoked! 

Really knocks you down where you gonna be for a while. Super euphoric. Strong, potent and a fantastic strain all and all.”

“From someone with fibromyalgia and a bunch of other pain issues. This is an amazing strain, my entire body buzzed slightly, my headache went away, then I fell asleep for 3 hours. It's not just great for sedating and pain it's also great recreationally  to chill out and talk about weird crap with your friends. It has a great taste it's earthy with a lemon taste that goes into your sinuses.”

“I work at a cannabis dispensary in in Oregon. I ALWAYS suggest this indica for my customers when they are looking for pain relief, munchies or sleep aid. GREAT for all 3! Did I mention that EVERY customer I suggest it to has come back and raves on how much they loved it? Try it for yourself. it's my favorite indica in our whole shop and ours isn't even on our top shelf. hope this helps”
“Very noticeable and pleasant pain-killing effects, less cerebral than your typical OG kush which was a nice change of pace, classic kush smell and look, can't go wrong.”
“Very potent indica”
“This strain will have you lit lit lit”
“Smoked this with some friends and everything became nice, from watching the rain to watching the sky to watching Getting Dough With High! :D”

“I work at a cannabis dispensary in in Oregon. I ALWAYS suggest this indica for my customers when they are looking for pain relief, munchies or sleep aid. GREAT for all 3! Did I mention that EVERY customer I suggest it to has come back and raves on how much they loved it? Try it for yourself. it's my favorite indica in our whole shop and ours isn't even on our top shelf. hope this helps”
“Didn't Smoke for 24+ hours and smoked a bowl of this out of my piece and was blasted after one hit.”

“I am ADHD and so varities tend to not work at expected.  Pure Kush works very well for pain management and for insomnia as long as it is not combined with other strains.  It does not play well with others.  I have found that use of high CBD varieties such as Harlequin in conjunction with Pure Kush leave my brain highly energized and sleep doesn't happen.
If you are ADHD and considering Pure Kush, approach it carefull...”
“Very noticeable and pleasant pain-killing effects, less cerebral than your typical OG kush which was a nice change of pace, classic kush smell and look, can't go wrong.”

“5/5 - a Kush Lover's fine wine!
Pure Kush is one potent indica. Personal nug I picked up weighed in at 3.6 and was tested at 24% THC.
A favorite of pain sufferers, Pure Kush’s strength will leave you relaxed, buzzed, and mildly sedated as you ease away your pain effortlessly.
The kush” aroma
column5: in that it is extremely pungent and skunky

column3: “Very potent indica”
“A damn good indica...you don't need much and it will put you in a pleasant place...”
“Very medicinal, it always gets me very sleepy and hungry. Little to no body sensation, but will get twitchy. Again, its a  very medicinal.”
“THIS SHIT RIGHT HEEEEEEERE”
“Wonderful strain!!!”
“crying at this i”

“This guy right here, made me tired and dreamy.  I managed to stay up for most of it.  Downside is I felt tons of dry eye and mouth.
 I found it to work very well as a sleep aid, in the future I may on use it as so because of this.  It had a Pine smell with an Incense base and taste.

I got mine at Swami's 420 Medi Mari Disp.”

“I hadn't smoked in over 7days and my home girl came back in town she said hey my home boys got some pure kush I'm bout to get some so I said fuck it I'll tapp the blunt a few times dude I was so fucking paranoid definitely I give this strain a thumbs up and give it 5 stars definitely medical grade ganja thanks for your help lea fly”

“So gone as now. 
Pure kush
Huh 
Don't get KO'd too hard boys and girls
Cause she packs a punch

5outof5
No pain
Ptsd under control
And I can sleep 

Thank you Pure Kush for being a true bro.”
“crying at this i”
“This is gooood! A veeeryy comfortable, relaxing high. Easy, good sleep not a lot of waking up.”
“Wonderful strain!!!”

“This strain is an awesome painkiller and sleep aid. Definitely a great choice for medical patients who suffer from chronic pain or insomnia, even loss of appetite and nausea, as this strain makes you hungry as hell. Great weed.”

“Note: i use a Volcano vapororiser; consider for strength/duration estimates.

This strain helps a great deal with my chemotherapy side effects, especially the lack of appetite and nausea. 
 
Mainly body stone: w/o total couchlock, but a couch is a good thing to have nearby.”

“I found this to be a decent strain. It hit me like  sativa i had  clear headed but obvious high. To me it ws good as a wake and bake thing. the odor is weird somewhat kushy but something very skunky about it.”
“My new go to bedtime strain. The guys that are doing this crop have it dialed in and is by far some of the most high quality floweres I've seen in a bit.9.7/10”

Definitely my favourite strain. Super relaxing and uplifting 🥤👾🔥🚀”

One of the best aspects is the mental state - it’s incredibly encouraging and thrilling. Feel an energy surging ahead, strong enough to throw you off balance and topple forward. Vision is rich, vibrant, but very narrow. Physically, it’s extremely soothing with a post-massage relaxation. Sense of to...”

Closing your eyes makes you  feel very dizzy...... and i was glue to my bed for an hour before going into a deep sleep....very weird and scary dreams which led me to...”

Full body stone sets in and the munchies follow.
I tend to fall asleep abruptly with this strain at higher doses.

Strong indica dom.”

My new night time medication.”

“Love this strain. It's a true stoner" high. Definitely something to eat after a long day at work.”"

“The Pure Kush I am evaluating I picked up from GreenHouse Centrum in Amsterdam, so that is the perspective this is based on.

When I asked to see this strain, on immediate inspection there were smaller to medium-sized buds with specks of dark green on a whitish light-green background with very few orange stigmas. I smelled it, and that is what sealed the deal (aside from the fact that it was the most premium flower t...”

“Picked this up from my go to local store Jardin today along with the same companies (Green and Gold Supply) Sour Kosher (which is 5 star and I would gladly review but isn’t listed here); grabbed an 1/8th if each.  I try and find something new to try every week if I can but everyone has staples, such as berry anything for me or old school Bubba; current favorite is Skunkberry. 

This is my first time trying this strai...”
“This strains plants you right into couch”
“Nice slow relaxing buzz; Great for anxiety and stress.”
“Was not a fan. Big body high and kind of dizzy.”

“Really strong indica. It will punch you strongly, i promise. Don't smoke if you are a beginner, this weed does not forgive. Flowery bucket in the mouth, clear and woody (sandalo). Just for sleeping, or better, just to die in your bed without space/time consciousness. Enjoy the space, great with chill and instrumental music. This weed has something more than others, i can't explain but everything is perfect in a relat...”
“one my favorite hands down”

“Quickly becoming one of my new favorite strains!  Love the taste... reminds me of a nice mild black tea.  Makes my body and mind relax without too much head high which is not good for my anxiety.  Use this lovely Kush for evening wind down and insomnia.  If you haven’t tried it, I suggest giving it a shot.  Pure Kush does not disappoint!”
“So relaxing! Like floating. Eyes are heavy. Glad I waited until bedtime. Probably not for beginners.”
“nice levels, real stoney... laidback”

“this is in top 3 kush strains. 

when I was able to grow this strain out yields were FANTASTIC.  4 zips off of a 3 foot plant and 8 off a 4.5 foot plant. 

the buds are dense and sound like velcro when torn apart (at least when I grew it) and they reek of skunk and pine with a hint of tar.

I have consumed this strain in every way imaginable and any way you go about it you will end up on the couch  (or bed) hungry as...”

“Picked some of this up recently.  Tight buds were mostly tan with muted green.  Aroma was piney and peppery with menthol.   Taste was like a clean fresh hay and grass.  Vapor was pretty rough and astrigent.  Each person trying it coughed.  High was pretty middle of the road indica high -- body numbing, relaxing, spacey -- but I was expecting a little more effect after trying Bubba Kush the day before which blew my mi...”
“Somewhat relaxing, but not as good as a master kush, or granddaddy purple. Probably wouldn’t purchase again.”
“Great taste, smooth smoke. Good feeling all over your body after ur head gets a lil rush.”
“Amazing, top shelf”
“very relaxing and helps with pain”
“tastes great and smells even better, it is excellent with the only drawback for me was being a pure kush, it kept me AWAKE half the night, very strange..”
“Tasty and knocks me out. Great for insomnia.”
“Had some again and i love this stuff for stress when i need to be able to function but smoke enough and its lights out.”
“This stuff is amazing I would recommend it highly”

“Definitely a head high. It feel like my head is filled with styrofoam; I could feel the pressure in my head. The nug is not supposed to have a berry aroma but berry is all I could smell. As soon as I vaporized this grass I tasted like pine or wood. Produced by Washington Bud Company. This is not something I would buy again. I was planning to buy a strain which could help me fall a sleep. I prefer Northern lights or B...”

“This was actually my first purchase of bud online, got on oz. at a great deal from PC. Nice dense little popcorn buds and a heavy hitting classic kush high that lasts quite a while, great for sleep and appetite issues also.”

“Aesthetically, it's a little leafy and stringy, but the color is that gorgeous fluorescent seafoam color and you can see the crystals on it from across the room. The taste is sweet: mainly lemon-lime (sweet and sour) with a hint of mint.”
“This didn't really work for me. Amped up my anxiety. Not as bad as some Sativas. Just an OK strain for me.”
“It looks and smells good and hits really smooth but the taste is dirty and it isnt an overly dense flower structure but it does get sticky enough to smash well”
“Head Knocker”

“Amazing body stone, resulting in full relaxation and pain free rest.  PK bye far is my favourite tasting, with a sweet perfumery taste that has me trying to put my finger on exactly what notes I am tasting.”
“tastes great and smells even better, it is excellent with the only drawback for me was being a pure kush, it kept me AWAKE half the night, very strange..”
“This didn't really work for me. Amped up my anxiety. Not as bad as some Sativas. Just an OK strain for me.”
“Nice relaxing high”

“This strain is awesome. Just yielded 1 1/2 pound wet a few weeks ago getting a little over 1/2 dry and loving the smoke. Covered in trichomes and such a smooth sweet smoke, 2 thumbs go up. hope to see it at the ranch for #420sweepstakes”

“love this strain 
simple as tht”

“This strain is awesome. Just yielded 1 1/2 pound wet a few weeks ago getting a little over 1/2 dry and loving the smoke. Covered in trichomes and such a smooth sweet smoke, 2 thumbs go up. hope to see it at the ranch for #420sweepstakes”

“it taste like a cinnamon almost for some strange reason!”
“A chill, but intense high. Good deal for the money.”
“Great bud, dank too. I'm so sleepy. I haven't been able to sleep for days so this will finally let me crash. I'm gonna have fun trippy happy dreams tonite!”

“love this strain 
simple as tht”

“Two med packed bowls does the trick. 
Long lasting effects. 
Very relaxed for hours and hours. 
Minimal Euphoria. 
Good chill smoke.”
“I dabbed some of this and wow super potent that's all I'm gonna say lol ;)”

“I am a fan of pink kush. White Palm had none bought by this and now it is one of my all time favorites. The tree is potent as one would like, furthermore the smell is lemon, Diesel with hashy undertones. Visually, the bud could not have been any more perfect. The purple lineage of the kush plant with glistening crystals on display accented with rich green hues...I will purchase the bud from White Palm, every chance I...”
“Smelled very berryish, the taste was i honestly forget lol, the high lasted a decent 45 minutes. a Nice stone, not over whelming but on the right level, where your feeling good all around.”
“This is the type of indica you smoke before bed! Pretty dank, nice head high!”
“Smoked this last night and I had one of the best sleeps I've had in months.”

“Real time review of Pure Kush. To me, this tasted a little cheesy, and I didn't like it. However, I'm not holding a grudge, as my mood is extremely pleasant and I barely have any sensation in my legs. For a RLS sufferer such as myself, saying, Legs? What legs?" is just dandy. I think I'll be going to bed soon.”"
“This is my all time favorite strain. Very relaxing and that's what I go for.”

“This one was beautiful. I remember the nugs were dark green and had a strong woody profile. Burned well, but also burned liked hell on the throat. The buzz was a heavy narcotic stone. When blended with other strains, it almost enhanced all the other herb in my salad. Miss this one dearly.”
“Rounded, gentle, mood lifter.”

“Pure Kush - Pure GOD Strain Of All Strains! I smoked 1 hit and sat on the couch for 2-3 hours without saying or doing a THING!!!!!! And I forgot to buy an ounce. Thats why I came over. I Dont Remember That WHOLE Day!!!!!!!!! But I WASN'T even ThErE!!!!!! That was from a dealer that hasn't got it lately. Oh well most of his BUDS KRON, but not like - PURE KUSH - COMA.”
“Makes you chill out and take a rest.”

“Another excellent strain for ptsd. Great for anxiety, depression, stress,insomnia and physical pain. A very relaxing  stone with a strong body high. Pungent skunky aroma, which I love. Beautiful flowers with ptsd healing powers. Heal on my friends. H20......”

“The taste is very neutral for weed. A little piney and smoked very smooth. Not much taste at all really. Definitely different from smoking some sweet strains like cookies or sour diesel. Effects mainly felt in the body. Very mellow, great for pain and anxiety. Can cause couch lock for sure. This definitely is one of my favorite indicas to date.”

“Not the most enjoyable kush out there in my opinion, but it's still a great generic strain to have around. Pure Kush has a piney, zesty smell to it, much like it's other kush cousins. It has frosty dense buds, and is a light green color. Pure Kush is great for winter, when arthritis is problematic and staying inside is a must. It will leave you highly relaxed but will leave you able to do things like cook or change t...”
“Just takes way too much out of me! Fun and relaxing and melts away pain but then I'm done for. Wasn't the best for its reputation.”
“The typical indica straight heavy stenchy sticky”

“Pure kush is a great name for this strain, the smell is very much like the earthy-hindu kush and the buds are dense and coated. Could see this stuff making great hash. Very narcotic effect, easy to find yourself asleep on couch with this one. 4.5/5”

“Completely pain free strain for all those that suffer with herniated discs. This is just what I needed to sleep through the night. With a kushy sweet aroma, and a realxed high, this is the perfect strain to end your long day.”

“This was actually my first purchase of bud online, got on oz. at a great deal from PC. Nice dense little popcorn buds and a heavy hitting classic kush high that lasts quite a while, great for sleep and appetite issues also.”

“Somewhat relaxing, but not as good as a master kush, or granddaddy purple. Probably wouldn’t purchase again.”

“Wow... I have class at 80% concentrate from pickled monkey  cartridges and the effect is instantaneous and extremely strong. This is almost a knock out after two hits or more  and is great for stimulating the appetite and relaxing and getting ready for bed. The taste is not overwhelming and it’s perfect for people who like a more earthy and pugnant taste, Even though the taste is pretty slight on this cartridge the h...”

“I gave this a low rating, not because of it's strength but because of it's effect.  This is one of the hardest indicas I've ever had.  After a very small amount, I couldn't move off my couch and needed to sleep.  And I did for about 10 hours.  There is nothing wrong with Pure Kush if you need sleep.  If you try this for anything more than that, you're on your own.”
“This will put you to sleep! Take it in moderation, I'd say.”

“Really relaxing. Great for personality disorder. If you knew me you'd agree I think.
I do, for obvious reasons, use this in the afternoon only. Which is helpful  for me, so I can wind down and then sleep.”

“It may just be an old batch, but it was super dry. I know the curing was done decently because the smoke was smooth and tasty, and the ash was white as well. I think the stem to flower ratio was a bit on the stemmy side. it could've also just been handled a bit. It definitely had that mushy smell to it, real earthy and pungent with skunky undertones. the bud structure was of your typical indica structure, squat dense...”
“Body high, very good pain reliever”

“This strain is awesome. Just yielded 1 1/2 pound wet a few weeks ago getting a little over 1/2 dry and loving the smoke. Covered in trichomes and such a smooth sweet smoke, 2 thumbs go up. hope to see it at the ranch for #420sweepstakes”
“Nice relaxing high”
“This stuff is amazing I would recommend it highly”

“This is definitely in my top five all time best indicas list. For starters, when using your grinder, you'll notice an intense amount of thick, cheesy, dusty broken down bud. “I grew this and harvested a bit early to get a bit of a sativa kick, and it's a very strong-smelling strain that delivers a fantastic behind-the-eyes high that lasts for hours. “Just picked up some pure og today and looked up some more info: 
Pure OG strain is a classic OG with a fresh fuel-like smell, smooth smoke, and great OG flavor. Pure OG is a San Fernando Valley (SFV) OG Kush F4 IBL (inbred line).

An IBL is a genetically homogeneous strain that grows uniformly from seed. When you cross two different IBL strains for the first time, it is called the F1 generation. When you cross two...”
“Very nice”
